participant_1.background:

I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
i take medication.
I am not close to my family and do not know what they do for a living.

my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.

i like barbies.
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to work hard and play hard.

content.text: I am well, thank you! How about you?
I am doing well as well! I am excited for the weekend, and I am going to visit my mom.
Oh that is nice! I hope you have a great time. I am going to be working on some projects this weekend.
What kind of projects are you working on?
I am working on fixing up a junk car and making YouTube videos about it.
Oh that sounds like fun! I love to watch YouTube videos. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is Anne of Green Gables. I love it because it is a heartwarming story about a young girl who finds her place in the world.
Oh I love that book! I read it when I was younger. It is such a classic.
It is! I am reading it again for the first time in a long time. I am enjoying it even more now that I am older.
That is great! I am glad you are enjoying it.
Thank you! I am happy we had this conversation. It was nice to talk to you!
It was nice to talk to you too! Have a wonderful weekend!
